item.title: Managed Enterprise Platform: Delivering Mission-Critical Observability with Splunk
item.description: Learn how Accenture Federal Services partnered with Splunk to deliver a comprehensive observability solution for one of America's largest federal financial agencies.

item.title: Dashboard Studio: Token Eval and Conditional Panel Visibility
item.description: Dashboard Studio in Splunk Cloud Platform can address more complex use cases with conditional panel visibility, token eval, and custom visualizations support.

item.title: Knowledge Graphs: What They Are and Why They Matter
item.description: Knowledge graphs can make organizing and understanding information much easier. Learn how they work and what benefits they provide in this comprehensive guide.

item.title: Energy-Efficient Computing: How To Cut Costs and Scale Sustainably in 2026
item.description: Energy efficient computing is an urgent challenge underscored by the exponential growth of AI use. Learn how to make computing operations more efficient.

item.title: SOLID Design Principles: Hands-On Examples
item.description: Learn SOLID design principles with hands-on examples. Discover how to write flexible, maintainable code and avoid common pitfalls as your projects grow.

item.title: How GSLB Improves Reliability and Performance Across Multi-Cloud Environments
item.description: Learn how Global Server Load Balancing (GSLB) optimizes performance, ensures uptime, and delivers seamless user experiences across global applications.

item.title: Understanding Cyber Resilience with the World Economic Forum
item.description: Discover what cyber resilience really means, and the seven areas that organisations need to invest in, to bolster their resilience. This post delves into the WEF's Cyber Resilience Compass and strategies for a proactive defence.

item.title: Introducing the Splunk Technology Add-on for Ollama: Illuminating Shadow AI Deployments
item.description: The Splunk Technology Add-on for Ollama shines a light on shadow AI, giving security teams full visibility and control over local LLM deployments.

item.title: Cybersecurity Awareness Month: Defend What Matters with Splunk Education
item.description: October is Cybersecurity Awareness Month – a reminder that protecting data and digital infrastructure isn’t just an IT responsibility; it’s everyone’s responsibility.

item.title: What is Observability? An Introduction
item.description: In this blog post, we'll look at definitions, best practices, and key concepts around Observability in IT.

item.title: What are SaaS, PaaS, & IaaS?
item.description: Yes, the cloud makes work better. But which cloud model is right for you? Understand how SaaS, PaaS, and IaaS works in this ultimate guide.

item.title: Telemetry 101: An Introduction To Telemetry
item.description: Telemetry is powerful data that can tell you all sorts of important information. Know what you can do with this useful data — get the full telemetry 101 here.

item.title: What Are SLMs? Small Language Models, Explained
item.description: Large language models have changed the world. What about small language models? Learn what SLMs are, how they differ from LLMs, and why SLMs are the future.

item.title: IT and Technology Spending & Budgets for 2025: Trends & Forecasts
item.description: Tech & IT spending is on the rise in 2025 across the globe. Read more on investment trends and see which regions will spend the most.

item.title: SIEM: Security Information & Event Management Explained
item.description: SIEM is a cybersecurity game-changer, especially for large organizations. Learn key SIEM features and functions & how to choose the right SIEM tool.

item.title: Splunk Ranked Number 1 in the 2025 Gartner® Critical Capabilities for Security Information and Event Management Use Cases
item.description: Splunk has been ranked as the #1 SIEM solution in all three Use Cases for the second consecutive time in the 2025 Gartner® Critical Capabilities for Security Information and Event Management report.
